Robert Turner

  1. Foster Name: Robert
  2. Foster Family: Dick Wessels
  3. Location of Family: Bloomington, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Franklin, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 9
  7. Date of Birth: [1904-XX-XX], Canada
  8. Gender: male
  9. Source: Franklin City News, 28 June 1913; OTR 356 and p 191; 1920 United States Federal Census; Miller & Paine for 100 Years Centuary Celebration #28 in Centennial Series. How the Orphans Fared by Dorothy W. Creigh.
